endpoints.description: This API endpoint retrieves your custom blacklist built in FraudGuard.io
endpoints.name: Get Custom Blacklist

endpoints.description: This API endpoint retrieves your custom Geographic blacklist built in FraudGuard.io
endpoints.name: Get Custom GeoBlock

endpoints.description: This API endpoint retrieves your custom whitelist built in FraudGuard.io
endpoints.name: Get Custom Whitelist

endpoints.description: This API endpoint retrieves IP reputation data for a specific Hostname. It is vastly more accurate and detailed but requires a paid plan.
endpoints.name: Specific Hostname Reputation v2

endpoints.description: This API endpoint retrieves IP reputation data for a specific IP. It is less accurate and far less detailed but is free forever.
endpoints.name: Specific IP Reputation v1

endpoints.description: This API endpoint retrieves IP reputation data for a specific IP. It is vastly more accurate and detailed but requires a paid plan.
endpoints.name: Specific IP Reputation v2

endpoints.description: This API endpoint retrieves Geographic, ISP and Organizational data for a specific IP.
endpoints.name: Specific IP v2 Geo,ISP & Org

info.description: FraudGuard is a service designed to provide an easy way to validate usage by continuously collecting and analyzing real-time internet traffic
info.name: FraudGuard
